article_title: Modern Healthcare Modern Healthcare business news, research, data and events
article_text: Bob Herman covers the health insurance industry and other healthcare news. Before joining Modern Healthcare in 2014, he covered hospital finance as a reporter and editor at Becker’s Hospital Review. He has a bachelor's degree from Butler University in Indianapolis

article_metadata.description: UnitedHealth Group may be abandoning most of the Affordable Care Act's insurance exchanges due to steep losses. But Centene Corp. is doing just fine.
article_metadata.title: Centene profiting from ACA plans, Medicaid expansion

article_summary:
Before joining Modern Healthcare in 2014, he covered hospital finance as a reporter and editor at Becker’s Hospital Review.
Bob Herman covers the health insurance industry and other healthcare news.
He has a bachelor's degree from Butler University in Indianapolis
